title: Last-Minute Change to Banquet Order
description: On the morning of an event, the client calls to add 10 more guests to their banquet.

tasks.description: Retrieve the BEO and check the maximum capacity of the event space.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms the room can accommodate 10 more guests.

tasks.description: Contact the kitchen immediately to see if they can accommodate the increased food order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The chef confirms they can handle the extra meals.

tasks.description: Update the BEO with the new guest count and final price, and inform the banquet setup team to add another table.
tasks.expected_outcome: All systems and teams are updated to reflect the change.
